channel.title: Items not appearing... wtf?
channel.description:
when I edit drops.cfg to put some party hats around seers village area they don't appear. Yes I remembered to compile. Coding looks like this:
[code]drop = 1038 2741 3474 1 0 1 Red Party Hat in Party Room drop = 1040 2729 3477 1 0 1 Yellow Party Hat in Party Room drop = 1042 2738 3462 1 0 1 Blue Party Hat in Party Room drop = 1044 2743 3466 1 0 1 Green Party Hat in Party Room drop = 1046 2736 3470 1 0 1 Purple Party Hat in Party Room drop = 1048 2739 3480 1 0 1 White Party Hat in Party Room [/code]
what's up with this? I'm sure it should work...
I'm using testscape btw.

item.title: Items not appearing... wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Surfingpikachao Surfingpikachao
item.description:
@Surfingpikachao wrote:

Theres a lag time before each player can see the items is there a way to stop that? And also each player sees his/her own version of the item (if you understand what I mean) how do you make it just one that everybody sees? (oh and I saw the itemspawnpoints.java thing before but when I did it I didn’t wait the lag time before logging out so didn’t see the items). [br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 02:49:24 PM[/size][hr]Sorry to bump but I still need help and there’s no point making a new topic.

Read full topic
